intro: Spiloxene alba, commonly known as the white spiloxene, is a flowering plant belonging to the Apiaceae family. It is native to the Mediterranean region and thrives in rocky and dry environments. The plant produces small, white, umbrella-like inflorescences that are characteristic of the carrot family. Its leaves are finely divided and have a delicate, fern-like appearance. Spiloxene alba is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is also used in traditional medicine.
